metadata.description: パターン認識テスト用のログサンプル
metadata.test_purpose: パターンマッチング精度テスト

log_samples.description: Docker権限エラーのサンプル1
log_samples.log_content: Got permission denied while trying to connect to the Docker daemon socket at unix:///var/run/docker.sock: Get "http://%2Fvar%2Frun%2Fdocker.sock/v1.24/containers/json": dial unix /var/run/docker.sock: connect: permission denied

log_samples.description: Docker権限エラーのサンプル2
log_samples.log_content: docker: permission denied while trying to connect to the Docker daemon socket

log_samples.description: Pythonインポートエラーのサンプル1
log_samples.log_content: ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'requests'

log_samples.description: Pythonインポートエラーのサンプル2
log_samples.log_content: ImportError: cannot import name 'HTTPAdapter' from 'requests.adapters'

log_samples.description: NPMインストール失敗のサンプル1
log_samples.log_content:
npm ERR! code ENOENT
npm ERR! syscall open
npm ERR! path /app/package.json
npm ERR! errno -2
npm ERR! enoent ENOENT: no such file or directory, open '/app/package.json'

log_samples.log_content: Connection timed out after 30 seconds

main.c:25:10: fatal error: stdio.h: No such file or directory

          ^~~~~~~~~
compilation terminated.

assert result == expected
AssertionError
